title: SLC13A5-Related Epileptic Encephalopathy: Rare Genetic Disorder Overview
short_description: Clinical overview of SLC13A5-related epileptic encephalopathy, a rare genetic disorder affecting approximately 50 reported patients globally across diverse ethnic backgrounds.
long_description: This document provides information about SLC13A5-related epileptic encephalopathy, a rare genetic disorder that demonstrates equal prevalence between males and females. The condition has been documented in approximately 50 patients worldwide, with cases reported across diverse ethnic populations from the United States, European countries, and South American nations. The document appears to serve as a clinical reference or educational material about this uncommon neurological condition, highlighting its global distribution and demographic characteristics based on published case reports and database entries.
